mapper.select: SELECT a.METER_ID as meterId , ifnull(date_format(a.READ_DT, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'') as readDt , a.CHANNEL as channel , FNC_GET_CODE_NM(a.CHANNEL) as channelNm , a.MESUREMENT_POINT_ID as measurementPointId , a.METER_SERIAL as meterSerial , a.CAPTURED_DIV as captureDiv , a.METER_VALUE as meterValue , a.METER_VALUE_INTERVAL as meterValueInterval , a.METER_STATUS as meterStatus , a.LP_INTERVAL as lpInterval , a.LOCATION_ID as locationId , FNC_GET_LOCATION_NM(a.LOCATION_ID) as locationNm , a.APT_NO as aptNo , b.APT_NM AS aptNm , DATE_FORMAT(a.mtime, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') AS mtime , DATE_FORMAT(a.itime, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') AS itime , a.DEVICE_ID AS deviceId , a.DEVICE_SERIAL AS deviceSerial , DATE_FORMAT(a.REG_DT, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') as regDt , DATE_FORMAT(a.UPDATE_DT, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') as updateDt FROM gnd_meter_value a LEFT OUTER JOIN gnd_apt_info b ON a.APT_NO = b.APT_NO

SELECT a.meter_id , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(a.read_dt, '%y%m%d%H%i%s'),'') AS readDt , a.mesurement_point_id as measurementPointId , a.meter_serial , a.captured_div , a.direction , a.active_pwr_tot , a.apprent_pwr_tot , a.lead_pwr_tot , a.lagging_pwr_tot , a.pf_pwr_tot , a.active_pwr_rate1 , a.apprent_pwr_rate1 , a.lead_pwr_rate1 , a.lagging_pwr_rate1 , a.pf_pwr_rate1 , a.active_pwr_rate2 , a.apprent_pwr_rate2 , a.lead_pwr_rate2 , a.lagging_pwr_rate2 , a.pf_pwr_rate2 , a.active_pwr_rate3 , a.apprent_pwr_rate3 , a.lead_pwr_rate3 , a.lagging_pwr_rate3 , a.pf_pwr_rate3 , a.active_pwr_rate4 , a.apprent_pwr_rate4 , a.lead_pwr_rate4 , a.lagging_pwr_rate4 , a.pf_pwr_rate4 , DATE_FORMAT(a.mtime, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') AS mtime , DATE_FORMAT(a.itime, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') AS itime , a.device_id , a.device_serial , a.location_id , FNC_GET_LOCATION_NM(a.LOCATION_ID) as locationNm , a.apt_no , b.APT_NM AS aptNm , a.reg_dt , a.update_dt FROM gnd_meter_billing a LEFT OUTER JOIN gnd_apt_info b ON a.APT_NO = b.APT_NO

SELECT a.meter_id , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(a.read_dt, '%y%m%d%H%i%s'),'') AS readDt , a.mesurement_point_id as measurementPointId , a.meter_serial , a.captured_div , a.active_pwr_tot , a.active_pwr_time , a.active_pwr_cum , a.active_pwr_rate1 , a.active_pwr_time_rate1 , a.active_pwr_cum_rate1 , a.active_pwr_rate2 , a.active_pwr_time_rate2 , a.active_pwr_cum_rate2 , a.active_pwr_rate3 , a.active_pwr_time_rate3 , a.active_pwr_cum_rate3 , a.active_pwr_rate4 , a.active_pwr_time_rate4 , a.active_pwr_cum_rate4 , a.apparent_pwr_total , a.apparent_pwr_time , a.apparent_pwr_cum , a.apparent_pwr_rate1 , a.apparent_pwr_time_rate1 , a.apparent_pwr_cum_rate1 , a.apparent_pwr_rate2 , a.apparent_pwr_time_rate2 , a.apparent_pwr_cum_rate2 , a.apparent_pwr_rate3 , a.apparent_pwr_time_rate3 , a.apparent_pwr_cum_rate3 , a.apparent_pwr_rate4 , a.apparent_pwr_time_rate4 , a.apparent_pwr_cum_rate4 , DATE_FORMAT(a.mtime, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') AS mtime , DATE_FORMAT(a.itime, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') AS itime , a.device_id , a.device_serial , a.location_id , FNC_GET_LOCATION_NM(a.location_id) as locationNm , a.apt_no , b.APT_NM AS aptNm , a.reg_dt , a.update_dt FROM gnd_meter_monthly_demand a LEFT OUTER JOIN gnd_apt_info b ON a.APT_NO = b.APT_NO

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.EVENT_DT, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') as event_dt , meter_id , event_cd , meter_serial , event_msg , device_id , device_serial , location_id , FNC_GET_LOCATION_NM(location_id) as locationNm , apt_no , DATE_FORMAT(a.REG_DT, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') as regDt , DATE_FORMAT(a.UPDATE_DT, '%y%m%d%H%i%s') as updateDt FROM gnd_meter_event_log a

SELECT meter_type , FNC_GET_CODE_NM(meter_type) as meterTypeNm , channel , FNC_GET_CODE_NM(channel) as channelNm , channel_idx , use_yn FROM gnd_channel_config a WHERE 1=1
AND a.METER_TYPE = #{meterType}

SELECT meter_type , FNC_GET_CODE_NM(meter_type) as meterTypeNm FROM gnd_meter_info a WHERE 1=1
AND a.METER_ID = #{meterId}
